keyFeatures.desc-1: Allows users to list, create, update, and delete labels for better organization of issues.
keyFeatures.desc-2: Provides a comprehensive view of issues, including their state, title, labels, number, and other relevant details.
keyFeatures.desc-3: Offers pagination and various filters such as 'Your issues,' 'Everything assigned to you,' and 'Everything mentioning you'.
keyFeatures.desc-4: Supports filtering by state, label, and assignee, and sorting options include newest, oldest, most commented, and more.
keyFeatures.desc-5: Displays detailed information about individual issues, including title, state, user, creation/closing timestamps, comments, reactions, assignees, and labels.
keyFeatures.desc-6: Allows users to list, create, update comments, and view a timeline and reactions for additional context.
keyFeatures.desc-7: Enables users to create new issues with specified titles, descriptions, assignees, and labels, supporting Markdown for formatting.
keyFeatures.desc-8: Allows users to securely authenticate and access the platform using Github OAuth authentication.

webDevToolkit.storybook-desc: Facilitate the development, testing, and documentation of UI components in isolation.
webDevToolkit.supabase-desc: To enable GitHub Auth for the project.
